lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK swDsMgu sbd suriq ilv pUrn bHm srbwqm kY jwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Gurmukhi Saadhasangu Sabad Surati Liva , Pooran Braham Sarabaatam Kai Jaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A Guru-conscious person strings the word divine in the thread of his consciousness in the company of saintly persons. He acknowledges the presence of omnipresent Lord in the form of soul in every one.

lines.gurmukhi: shj suBwie irdY BwvnI Bgiq Bwie ibhis imln smdrs iDAwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Sahaj Soubhaai Ridai Bhaavanee Bhagati Bhaai , Bihasi Milan Samadaras Dhiaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: He is ever engrossed in the love and faith of the Guru Lord in his mind. He treats all alike and smilingly too.

lines.gurmukhi: inmRqw invws dws dwsn dwswn miq mDur bcn muK bynqI bKwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Nimrataa Nivaas Daas Daasan Daasaan Mati , Madhur Bachan Moukh Baynatee Bakhaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The Guru-conscious person who ever lives in the presence of the True Guru is always humble and has the intellect of being the slave of slaves (of the Guru). And when he speaks, his words are sweet and full of supplication.

lines.gurmukhi: pUjw pRwn igAwn gur AwigAwkwrI AgRBwg Awqm Avys prmwqm inDwnIAY ]137]
lines.transliteration_english: Poojaa Praan Giaan Gur Aagiaakaaree Agrabhaaga , Aatam Avays Paramaatam Nidhaaneeai ?137?

Shabad OS B.translation: A Guru-oriented person remembers Him with every breath and stays in Lord's presence like an obedient being. Thus his soul remains absorbed in the treasure house of peace and tranquillity. (137)
